channel.title: Help me with some medium 317 stuff :)
channel.description:
i need help on
1. how to add that u cant log out in combat?
2. how can u add that u cant teleport in combat?
3. how to make certain npc's aggresive?
4. how to make the logout button in top off the client like the others instead off this pic :)
[IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/1270010004.png[/img]
if u cant see the text it says
: how can i do so i can see running steps,logout button,prayer and hp in the corner and instead off down onn the inventory the logout button will be at the corner?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2009, 09:43:11 am[/size][hr]sombody please help me
